website_summaries.verdict: An impressive safe with the capacity for multiple handguns to hang safely.
pros: Can be bolted to a floor or wall
cons: Red interior light is dim, making it difficult to see

customer_reviews.title: Tac light on handgun, would not fit, solution found!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed when my handgun with a rail mounted tactical light blocked the barrel post, preventing the gun from securing in the rack. But like any red-blooded ammosexual, I found a solution. Get yourself a bitdriver, and slap a 8mm socket on it. Then unscrew the two tiny bolts holding the barrel posts. Invert the barrel posts so the bulky post bar is now on top, reinstall bolts. Viola, your tacticool accessorized gun now fits. Now stand majestically in front of your waving American flag and drink a beer, for you are a true defender of freedom. Pew pew, Murica.
customer_reviews.author: Reaper

customer_reviews.title: Nice pistol safe
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, option to set buttons to silent mode, red interior light works well to illuminate location of pistols but it would be nice to have the option of a white led light (maybe a removable red lens over a white led?) It needs + and - indicators in battery compartment if indeed it matters how the 9 volt battery should to be installed. I had to just guess. Could be a litter deeper (one or two inches) for longer barrel guns. My Ruger Mark IV Hunter just barely fits if I angle it in on the bottom of the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Faulty latch
customer_reviews.text: My unit seemed to work fine....Until I was going to the range, entered my code, click......and it did not open. Tried a couple of times. Used the key finally, changed the battery, still click but not opening. What if it had been a home invasion? Not good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Finney

customer_reviews.title: Minor drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Boyt safe with this one and it’s definitely a good buy. Only complaint is that the cable provided is junk. Only design “asks” would be, ditch the cable for mounting hardware and volume control or mute for the keypad. It’s really loud which is great from a child standpoint but all bad for being discreet of an intruder is in the house. Don’t plan on hanging a handgun with a light that isn’t flush. It holds my M&P Shield w/ flush laser, XD9 w/out the light and my 1911.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty door mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the electronic lock. Unfortunately the door doesn't spring open and I either have to tilt it up or push hard at the bottom for it to open. I may return it...
customer_reviews.author: S. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Good cost-effective, convenient gun lock-box
customer_reviews.text: Good size, shape, easily secured to furniture. I like the interior light and it will easily hold my 4 guns.
customer_reviews.author: petej

customer_reviews.title: Less than one year later. The electronic release quit ...
customer_reviews.text: Less than one year later. The electronic release quit working. Even tried Lithium 9v and different combinations. Safe will just beep but not open. Not much use if you have to look for a key,in the middle of the night, after hearing a sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small, secure safe for home defense that didnt cost a fortune. I feel this safe is very secure and heavy duty. I love the posts on the back wall allowing quick access to my pistol. The red light is a good idea and just bright enough to see what you need. Plenty of room and may take out the shelf to open it up even more. Only drawbacks I notice is you cant enter your code as fast as I'd like and the door is a bit loud when it slams down. Not a big deal (I'll just catch the door when opening). I just got it but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COVID-19 TP Protector 2020
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, keeps the TP out of reach of abusers from the 2020 COVID-19 after the Presidents Speech.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando

customer_reviews.title: Size is great for multiple items
customer_reviews.text: Size is great for multiple items. Keypad stopped unlocking the door within the first couple months under normal use.. When the keypad is used it sounds like it is working but will not unlock the door or it takes multiple times slowing the process. It can still be accessed with the key but that defeats the purpose of a key pad. When it arrived there were no instructions on how to secure the cable lock there were instructions on how to install the battery. I would personally stay away. I will throw it away if the key stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great safe!
customer_reviews.text: Great safe! One thing I would do is make the gun bars a lighter color. It's a bit hard to see them. Nothing a flashlight can't solve though. I secured mine to a hundred pound desk, then put a cut out cardboard box over it. I don't think a bad guy would even know it's there...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: After a While, Won't Open Until Code is Input 6-8 Times
customer_reviews.text: Well, this pistol safe appeared to be just the ticket. Holds three pistols and extra magazines. But then it started to become reluctant to open when I input the code. Could take 4-5 times. Replaced the battery and changed code. Worked well initially but then developed the same problem. Now takes inputting the code 6-8 times to get it to open. No bueno when you need a gun! There is no on line support. So, buying another product. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Two defective units and no reply from vendor
customer_reviews.text: First unit included a defective lock. Replacement unit included defective electronics & alarm that drained new, brand name batteries in just a few hours. Vendor failed to reply or refund after sending second defective unit. Thankfully, Amazon resolved through refund. Unfortunately, I really wanted a working unit.
customer_reviews.author: Graystone71

customer_reviews.title: Workaround needed for the battery
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a solid safe. The only thing wrong with it is the poor design of the battery housing and connection. The battery would not stay connected therefore the combination and light did not work. Instead of sending it back I bought a pack of battery extensions with gator clips for $8. Luckily, the battery’s housing snaps on and off pretty easily for access. I’m pretty happy with the workaround so I may buy a second one for my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: California Marc

customer_reviews.title: S-L-O-W code entry. Errors 50/50 if your too fast!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Size, quiet drop door, internal light, silent code entry Cons: Code entry doesn’t work every time unless you go SLOOOW, thin interior lining, hangers won’t work with rail mounted light systems, mechanism plate that stops the door from slamming down BENDS and eventually needs to be readjusted. Since I have rail mounted lights on all my pistols I removed the hangers and shelf, added real foam, then cut to fit 2 full size pistols, 2 magazines, and a subcompact under the bottom shelf. Much quicker draw now but it did take some doing. The slow code entry is the worst part about it though.
customer_reviews.author: SinewavZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe with 1 defect!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this safe it fits my guns, my bullets and my extra clips very well. It's a nice and sturdy safe. My only issue is the battery mechanism, my safe is in my closet where there is no power outlet so I'm forced to use a battery to power the electric keypad to unlock the safe but unfortunately the battery connectors are defective and won't connect to the battery consistently, i saw multiple reviews saying the same thing, so buyers if you're storing this safe in an area where there is no power outlet keep your keys handy!
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love The safe. It's perfect for keeping the Grand kids safe. No this safe won't protect your guns from professional or very determined thieves but it doesn't cost a $1000.00 of more. It's great for what it's designed for, keeping your handguns or anything else you put in it from being picked up without your knowledge. Only con is the battery orientation is not clearly marked liked the directions stated. Mine is working fine now. The first battery I tried just made it beep. I realized it was almost dead (new off the shelf). Put in a good tested battery and it now works fine. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Sokinas

customer_reviews.title: Defective on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The Stealth Safe was never put in service. The pistol mounting rods are problematic and there is no reasonable fix. I understood that sub-compacts could be a problem, but my Ultra Carry Kimber continuously fell off the rods while a Micro Max .380 worked fine. The unit arrived with a defective door that was not dampened as advertised. The door which is spring loaded to quicken access to the guns slammed against its spring without any dampening and against the table top. Imagine the noise that makes, and therefore makes “stealth” as advertised, impossible. I gave up on the safe and returned it when I subsequently found that oil had leaked out of the dampener which should be permanently sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nicely designed safe in some ways
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nicely designed safe in some ways. I loved how the door just popped open softly. Problem was as soon as I changed the 6 digit pin the door stopped opening with the code. This was right out of the box. Totally unacceptable product failure for an electronic gun safe, designed in such a way that it would fail at the most important task you needed it to do. Absolutely crazy, it's like driving a car off the lot and having the engine instantly die.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Roussis

customer_reviews.title: Consider the size
customer_reviews.text: Construction seemed very good. The electronics worked as described. Couple of things detracted: The safety lanyard was a little hard to connect to the safe; the hanger rods won't accept a 22cal revolver; and the 357cal revolver (5" barrel) was too long to hang it for the box size and had to lay it down. Both 9mm's worked fine. With the 357 laying, there wasn't much room for ammo. Considering these drawbacks, it's still a good item.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like the safe. Here is why the get one star, customer service. I emailed them about a month ago because the battery would hook dead after about a day. I asked for assistance or repair with no responses yet. It is useless to me if I have to use a key to open the safe, when I bought it so I would not need to use a key to open it.
customer_reviews.author: scott lakin

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good safe to keep little hands off of dangerous objects. I like that it does have a key back-up should the battery die on you. The instructions are pretty clear on how to install the battery, and set the combination. It comfortably holds my pistols, even one with a laser/light on the accessory rail. The only criticism I have is that I would have liked to have some mounting holes so that I could lag-bolt this to a wall, or shelf. The cable is ok, especially if your going to use this in a vehicle, but not my idea for home use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs exactly
customer_reviews.text: Decent safe. I got mine to keep little hands out of my home defense pistols. I can keep 3 pistols in here which is great. Turn the hangars upside down if you want to store guns with lights. The key release is nice and the battery powered keypad is really cool. It makes loud noises when buttons get pushed. I like that so I can tell if my toddler is playing with the safe, but not ideal if there's an intruder and you're trying to be quiet. It also comes with a cable lock to the it to something and instructions to bolt it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this safe for about a year now, and I am very happy with it. I currently have three handguns secured within this safe when they are not in use, and it is the perfect size for all of them, plus any magazines, rounds, or any other small item that I wish to keep secured. It is very reliable and easy to use. When you get it, just install a nine volt battery, create a numeric combo that is easy for you to remember, and that is it. I really like the key override as well, although I've never had to use it because the lighted electric combo has never failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to silence the beeps very easy to reset the ...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to hold 4 hand guns. Don't think it'd hold any long barrel revolvers or large bore. A Glock 19 hits the shelf on the inside. If you put 3 on the hangars room to grab one will be limited. The door does drop open very quietly other than the latch release being kinda loud in a quiet room. Very easy to silence the beeps very easy to reset the passcode. The light on the inside could stay on a little longer but not a deal breaker. Overall I'm very pleased with what it is and what my needs are.
customer_reviews.author: That parts guy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Safe stopped working right away! I can only use with a key. The battery doesn’t sit right in where it is suppose to go so there is not a good connection and can not use the combination. I can only use with a key. Waste of money. Because the whole point is to have quick access to my guns, not go get a key in case of emergency and unlock the gun first. An intruder will not wait for me to get my key to unlock my safe. I will be looking for another safe. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yadira Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Poorly conceived
customer_reviews.text: Essentially useless. The hangers can only accommodate pistols with barrels ranging from just over 3 inches to 4 inches that do NOT have an accessory rail. At 3 inches or shorter the pistol sags and isn't secure on the hanger. Anything longer then 4 inches had a trigger guard blocked by the the hanger's support. Sentry safes have easy access to the holes on the floor of the safe for bolting to the floor while this safe has the flooring foam (very thin) glued to it's floor and I didn't want to pull it up considering how poorly designed it is and how cheap it feels. I do not recommend this safe and I am returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney E

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for but i like the design. Door gets a bit stuck however.
customer_reviews.text: This safe is unique in that there aren't really any designed like this where you can have a waist level handgun safe with your guns upright and at this capacity, with a little room for magazines or speed loaders. The door does not open when I enter the code. I have to Fonzie it open (bang on the top) I'd RMA it, but I would have no safe place to put my excess guns. Seems the tolerances of the door are way too tight. Otherwise it's a great safe for the money..id like a drilled out bottom or back to bolt it in place, but it's a cheap safe. Compliment sandwich seewhatididthere?
customer_reviews.author: M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Paint completely peeling after 6 months of ownership
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this safe in November '18. I went to move it while cleaning and the paint slid right off, nearly causing me to drop the safe on my foot. Thankfully it hit the floor instead but left a nice dent in the wood. This is despite only owning it for 6 months and it being stored consistently in a climate controlled house. As you can see from the video, it takes almost no effort to push the paint right off as it is not bonded to the metal. There are much better safes on the market, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kcaron

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for my firearms
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this since my collection of personal handguns outgrew the personal vault. I liked the design of hanging the firearm for quick access and draw. Sadly, there is a 'shelf' at the rear of the safe that kept 2 of my guns from sliding far enough onto the hanger to be secure. They would fall off the hanger when safe was opened. I returned and purchased a second vault, but will keep looking for one of this design.
customer_reviews.author: malcat

customer_reviews.title: it's a great safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this would be 5 stars if i could find out what the coating is or have some guarantee that the rods won't scratch my barrels. it's a great safe and easy to use. holds my guns at the ready with no problem. would be great is it had a silent mode as i'd prefer not so send loud beeps through my home if i needed to open it in a more clandestine fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic safe. Buttons provide a sturdy click and beep ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic safe. Buttons provide a sturdy click and beep when pressed. Door shoots open quickly. Low voltage red LED for interior illumination, but it only remains illuminated for 5 seconds. Strong paint odor upon arrival, but as instructed you must let it air out for about 2-3 days before use. Strong, sturdy safe. Small enough for a night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Very good rapid access safe. Keeps kids and others away while giving the owner very quick access.
customer_reviews.text: Feels really solid. Opens quickly and opens Everytime. Door mechanism is great and doesn't let the heavy door slam down. Wish the buttons responded a little faster, you cant press the buttons immediately one after the other, have to wait about half a second in between button presses. Still only takes about 5 seconds to open. If the buttons we're faster id give it 5 stars. I still recommend it and will very likely buy another one soon for a different part of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality all around
customer_reviews.text: After a month the door stopped popping open on its own and I have to shake it to open it. Also the key for the security is the wrong one so I cant even secure it. Terrible quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Paul

customer_reviews.title: Bad key pad
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product since 2017. Initially it worked as advertised. This only lasted several months. The lock failed to open. The battery was changed and it worked periodically. A replacement key pad was installed with same results. At this point in time late 2019, it will not open without a key. I personally know of two acquaintances with the same problem in the use of this safe. The company needs to find a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Kr

customer_reviews.title: Decent safe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The safe is sturdy enough for the cost, it will be effective in keeping our gun safe and out of children's hands. As others have mentioned the beeping sound was quite annoying while pressing the buttons but in the instructions there's a way to turn that off. The main reason I'm giving it a lower than 5 star review, is after learning my combination pattern I could do it faster than it could register, so to enter it at a nice calm pace might be hard in a stressful situation.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and not reliable, not good for quick access
customer_reviews.text: I received a faulty product. The code works but the key only works when you turn the safe entirely upside down, imagine asking an intruder to hold it upside down for you if the code didn’t work. Not reliable or good for quick access. Usually have to enter the code multiple times to get the safe to register the buttons. Also takes a moment for the door to open. Talked to the company about it and they offered replacing it but never heard back from them when I decided to go through with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping little hands off the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I usually always avoid reading the 5 star reviews thinking they are either employees or some other such thing. This time I have to give it what it deserves. I purchased this safe to have easy fast access to my firearm while still keeping it safe from my kiddo. This safe does all that and more. The small size means it can fit into a cupboard easily and the buttons for the combination are a great feel and size. I totally recommend if you are looking for a small safe for safety from little hands this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Heil

customer_reviews.title: Nice small safe
customer_reviews.text: This safe works exactly as advertised. The door pops open but doesn't slam down. It works consistently. It fits in a small space where I had limited options. I had no problem getting it programmed and working. I did have to draw my own template to determine where to put the screws to install the safe, but I recycled an old target for that purpose and it wasn't difficult. I'm not sure I will use the hanging rods. I have some concern about contact with the inside of my barrels. I like the concept but I'm unsure about the impact. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little package.  Priced right and the perfect size to tuck away.
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe. Bought to keep guns in different area of the house from main safe. This little safe fits that need nicely. Holes to bolt it down, or little cable mean you can take it with you. I personally would not really trust the cable to hold the safe in place, but is a nice option to have. Unlocking is a breeze and has proven more reliable that similar priced safes with finger print scanners. Moulded finger placement means i can still easily operate the safe in 0 light situations. The little light inside is a nice feature and easy enough to disable if that's not your preference. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan E.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the safe that I would highly recommend do to the sturdiness and durability. It's also great to have when you have small children. I keep this along side of my bed for quick and easy access. You can shut off the noise when entering the code so no one hears you push the buttons. It's very slick many people that I know has got this safe after they seen mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: This safe serves about one purpose for me, and that is to help me be a responsible gun owner by taking “reasonable” steps toward securing my firearms against theft. It definitely isn’t going to stop someone who really wants to get into it. I wouldn’t store the hope diamond in it. For three pistols and some magazines and maybe a little bit of ammo, it’s significantly better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: A “steal,” for the money
customer_reviews.text: This safe is a steal for the money. Quality construction, and ample space for 5 pistols. What I love most is also it’s potential downfall: complete simplicity. The 6-digit code makes engaging/opening the safe a simple/quick task. However, it may prove to be little more than. A deterrent for a determined thief, or teenager. Over all, 4.5/5 in my book. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: L4Redav

customer_reviews.title: Latch not releasing the door
customer_reviews.text: Update: after two years, we now have to leave the safe unlocked as the latch will not release the door. I’ve tried replacing the batteries, oiled up the latch and hinges, but nothing is working. We now have to take something skinny to wedge in between the door to open it. Looks like we will be looking for another safe. Very disappointed. Bought this safe for my husband. It holds two hand guns and a taser with room to spare. We especially like the red illuminating light and the cord to lock the safe down. Highly recommend this safe to anyone who needs to lock down multiple handguns.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the first one I received, but a replacement was sent and I’m pleased with the product. Changing the code was simple, as was turning off the beeping. The safe is well constructed and is perfect for home safety. There are pre-drilled holes on the bottom for mounting using 1/4” bolts. I used carriage bolts to mount as they fit into the mounting tracks and sit flush on the bottom of the safe. Highly recommend for anyone wanting keep their guns safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality on electronics
customer_reviews.text: Finger code access stopped working after one year of hardly any use. I contacted the company and because it is past warranty they cannot help. I have seen dozens of similar complaints. It is too bad as the size is perfect if you buy this make sure to buy extended warranty! I am looking elsewhere to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Fly

customer_reviews.title: No problems setting the new password and the safe arrived in perfect condition. DISREGARD all the 1 Start and 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got the safe today. No problems setting the new password and the safe arrived in perfect condition. DISREGARD all the 1 Start and 2 Star reviews that talk about the beep when you push the buttons....one quick push of an inside button and the sound is gone. I usually find something to pick on, but not yet and since it's so simple and straight forward, I doubt I will. Great safe for the money and it will frustrate crooks while the home alarm is telling them time is short until the folks in Blue show up and it will certainly protect my grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: dw323

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my situation
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that, after realizing that the delivery address was wrong on the order, Dean Safe was very accommodating getting the safe to the correct address. Thank you, Dean Safe, for understanding and helping. The safe is exactly as advertised. Battery powers the red interior light, which can be switched off. The touch tone can also be switched off, which is much appreciated opening at night. There is plenty of room for my Sig P320, Kimber micro 9, and 6.5” Rough Rider (lays flat on bottom). Perfect for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Solid safe
customer_reviews.text: Construction seems solid. Door opened quickly and quietly. The ability to plug the safe into a wall outlet is an excellent feature, never have to worry about a dead battery. It has room for 3 full-size handguns with extra magazines. Only issue would be any handguns with tac lights will not fit on the hangers without some modification. But, the safe is large enough that a full size weapon could be placed on the floor of the safe and not on the hanger. Overall, for a secure bedside storage with reliable quick access, it seems to fit the bill well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: I like this safe!
customer_reviews.text: I like my safe because of the security options available: combo lock with a key, and the cable lock. The lighted entry is a plus because I don't have to fumble in the dark to see inside the safe. You can easily accommodate more than 3 handguns in the safe... and the shelf is removable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the safe very long but so far so good. It was easy to program and opens every time I input the code. I mostly like that it holds multiple pistols + mags and that it automatically locks when closed. Also, it's glaringly obvious that it is open when it is open. I have another large quick safe that I thought I would keep multiple pistols in, but the lid closes under gravity the position of a small plastic knob is the only way tot ell that it's unlocked...this is much less likely to be accidentally left open OR unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: N. F. C..

customer_reviews.title: Big and heavy - but that's good for a safe
customer_reviews.text: Big and heavy - but that's good for a safe. Instructions not clear on battery + / - placement. Had to call support as instructions DO say not to reverse the battery because damage may occur, but there are no marking on the battery compartment. Support laughed and stated that actually, battery placement doesn't matter - can be placed either way... and they were right. One star off for that 15 minutes I spent working it out. That said - great safe. Hangers do not fit Glock pistol with light attached, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Andalyn

customer_reviews.title: Great little safe!! Fits 5 guns comfortably!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe. Bought it for my bed piece only. However pictured are 5 guns, sig p226 TACOPS, m9a3, glock 34, sig p238 and sig p320. 4 fairly good sized guns and they fit comfortably. It also holds 4, 20rd mags/8, 17rd mags without my p320 in it. It has a lot of space for its tiny design. It is very light weight so a thief could easily pick it up and run away with it thats why I gave it 4 stars for security. It gives you double keys to the box lock and cable lock. However as a child deterrent it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley KOWALSKI

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, but rack needs to be adjusted/redesigned to hold guns with laser sights
customer_reviews.text: The safe works great! Looks good, opens flawlessly. The problem I have is with the gun rack for a gun with a laser sight on it. I did what another reviewer suggested and turn the rack upside down to create more clearance between the posts and the shelf below. Additionally, I bent the posts upward slightly so the gun would not slide off. Very functional now, but there is a piece of unpainted metal in the back that was uncovered when I reversed the rack. I would likely purchase this gun safe again though.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W. Flolid

customer_reviews.title: A safe that keeps your pistols secure,yet allows you quick access when you need to get to your guns.
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased a so called "Biometric Pistol Safe" and finding it totally unreliable, I replaced it with a Stealth Hanger Safe. The hangers allow you to position your weapons for quick access. The digital code never fails, the door drops immediately and turns on a red led light so you can see your weapons, even in the dark. I am very impressed with everything about this safe and while be getting another for my other guns. I most definitely recommend this safe. JwL
customer_reviews.author: JwL

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe, Minor Flaw
customer_reviews.text: This gun safe works great and is very sturdy. The only problem I have is the speed at which you have to type in the combination. If you go to fast it won't open. In an emergency where you need your gun as fast as possible, it will be hard to consciously slow yourself down when your pressing the button combination. Other than that, a great safe.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Black

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. only 2 upgrades I'd request. First an AC adapter as primary power and battery backup. second, a bit thicker steel. The safe is well put together but it just "feels" thin. Neither requests are held against this product as it's exactly as I knew it would come. Keep up the good work Dean Safe Company!!
customer_reviews.author: Funman

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy peace of mind at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good on this handgun safe. Product seems sturdy and is big enough for my needs. Only thing that I would change or add to this if anything is holes on the back of the safe for possible wall mount. Also I would have the light stay on for a bit longer as it only last about 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Flores

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Got it in less than a week! Very nice! Sturdy construction! Plus it comes with a adapter to plug in! Would definitely recommend getting it,,,needed a secure home for my 2 9mm and my 45acp ,and there's foom for 2 more guns on the bottom plus a shelf for some ammo,,at this price you cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy box small enough to conceal and large enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy box small enough to conceal and large enough to hold 5 of my handguns(3 hanging, 2 laying). Really like the secondary safety tether that came with it. Couple holes drilled through my hutch and an anchor bolt in the concrete and i've got a great second tier of safety.
customer_reviews.author: ACrowell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good size, works just as advertised. There are pre-drilled holes in the bottom so the safe can be bolted to a shelf or floor, which I will definitely use. Unfortunately, it didn't come with hardware for that, and also has no information as to what size bolts the holes accommodate and/or manufacturer recommendations for installation. Would have cost next to nothing and been very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: A bit small, bad paint, but will keep small hands away from danger.
customer_reviews.text: Holds semi autos ok, .45 and 2 9mm, but not .357 with 6" barrel. Should have gotten something bigger. Main issue for me is the paint was bubbled on the door and flaked off as soon as I touched it. Not worth returning, i'll paint it or cover it with vinyl, but it's pretty shoddy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fry daddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice handgun lockbox
customer_reviews.text: Nice lockbox. Love the hanger style gun supports. Leaves guns at the ready when opened. The red light illuminates when opened, which is really a nice feature. No need to turn on the a light or fumble for a flashlight in the dark. The key pad also lights up when pushed. The only reason I gave 4 stars is the beeping when the keys are pushed. Kind of defeats the "stealth" name. Great lock box anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: spike7

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just before my daughter became mobile. Easy to use, great knowing my firearms are inaccessible to her. This will not keep adults from stealing, or walking away with the whole thing, which is fine since that is not why I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Welds to floor of car trunk. See photo.
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Here is a photo of the safe welded to the floor of my trunk. Blue tape is to protect safe when we paint the floor of the trunk. Obviously, thick enough metal to weld. But, this is not like a floor safe. I love it. You will, too.
customer_reviews.author: mark prusa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The beeps are annoying, but the rest of this is spot on. It just works great. I did air it out for 3 days in the garage to get rid of the glue smell. Also, I tool the electronic part apart and found the speaker horn that makes the beeps. I put electrical tape over it, and reassembled. It is half as loud now. I wish they made a larger model, but I guess I can just buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great gun safe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, not too big. Holds 3 compact semi-autos on the pins. Room below for mags, holsters, other handguns. Keypad is comfy and accessible. Beeps are loud. Glue/sealant smell is STRONG when it arrives. They recommend leaving it open in a well ventilated space for 24 hours. Try 72 and a bowl of coffee grounds for a month after, lol. Still, function is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: abacus6

customer_reviews.title: The key for this safe was hidden within the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The key was withing two layers of cardboard on a side of the package opposite the side I opened. I tossed out the packaging before realizing I did not have the key. The company making the safe was aware of hidden key problem. They could not replace the key. My alternative was to get a second safe. The safe is a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Easy to use. Keeps others hands off. With enough time and the right tools it could be broken into. But this was not meant to be a vault. For its purpose, it gets 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: LesBes

customer_reviews.title: hangun
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around for a handgun safe in stores and could not find one like this one. What I like about this safe is the size of the unit, the combination and keylock for the door which gives you quick and easy access to your firearm, I also like the built in light and barrel hangers for firearm readiness. love this product would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: walter martin

customer_reviews.title: If you own handguns you need this safe
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy I found this safe. It’s so convenient and the pop open door when the code is entered and the light comes on inside so you can see which firearm you are grabbing. There is plenty of room for full-sized handguns extra clips and more ammo. Best safe I ever bought!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wyche

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Open, Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I was able to secure this to a shelf in the bedroom closet using the screw holes in the bottom. Seems very secure. Holds .45 bedside weapon with and extra magazine. Also put CC weapon with holster and extra magazine in it when I get home. Easy to open, roomy enough to meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wintes

customer_reviews.title: Great bedside pistol safe!
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. I like the size (which fit perfectly in the location I purchased for). I only wanted it for 2 handguns but there is plenty of room for more if needed. I keep a full size on one of the hangers and lay my carry gun in the bottom when I need to store it. Keypad seems very reliable and I like the fact that the key beep can be disabled for silent entry. I would recommend catching the door as it drops since it does open rather quickly and can make enough noise to be heard in a silent environment.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Good bedside safe
customer_reviews.text: Safe seems very secure and easy to program. The only negatives i have found are the power cord is very short and the outlet is on the side of the safe. Since i am a lefty, the placement of the safe puts the power output on the wrong side. If it were located on the back of the safe it would work better. Same with the security cable. The interior light is perfect for being able to see the gun when the safe is opened, but it is very difficult to see the barrel posts in the back of the safe when trying to put the gun back inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: very nice, like the size and space you get
customer_reviews.text: very nice, like the size and space you get. 6 digit code is just a bit time consuming to complete (maybe just 1 or 2 added seconds). Plan to transition this from the night stand to below the gun rack with magazines, ammo and one hand gun. The hangers are rubber coated with a sleeve which does leave the mettle tip exposed. But is you take your time placing the gun on the hanger you have no worries of any damage. Oh, the night stand? full bio-metric reader is the plan, single gun.
customer_reviews.author: grindels

customer_reviews.title: Great safe!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a couple of years now and the battery still holds power. I have 3-4 pistols inside with a small ammo supply and other small items. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: James Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Well made. Has silent option to turn of beeps when you key in your code. Door drops open quickly with a small spring action yet door doesn’t slam open but slows at the end of opening to a soft finish. Red LED light inside for lowlight upon opening gives just the right amount of light to see what you’re grabbing without being excessive. You can’t open it with a stupid straw as there is a piece of metal that was added to prevent that. I am very happy with this item. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Scott Reed

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe. It has three hanging slots for handguns and extra space for ammunition and other small items. It's compact enough that I keep it under my desk, and the safety cable that comes with it is also a huge plus. The response time for the keypad buttons is great too. I also love how the interior red light turns on automatically whenever the safe opens. It's a really cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: research more on guns that will hang
customer_reviews.text: Its ok and is a functioning safe so I can't complain about that. However it makes no mention that you cant't hang a .22 because the hanging rods are too large for the barrel. I was trying to hang my wife's S&W MP22. My Glock 19 hangs with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company to deal with!
customer_reviews.text: Great company to work with. I did a boneheaded thing about 5 minutes after delivery. I locked the wrong set of keys in the safe before I put a battery in it. Be advised that the keys for the safe and the keys for the cable lock look very similar. So, I screwed up. The fine employees at Dean Safe worked with me via emails and phone calls to rectify my screw up. Great, great company. I fully recommend them to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Love this safe
customer_reviews.text: These are such good safes I own 3 of them. Only one of them goes thru batteries, customer service is so good they send the repair parts for FREE, Parts are free and shipping was free. DEANS safes is the best.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY

customer_reviews.title: Great product, large enough for 3 handguns
customer_reviews.text: Great product, large enough for 3 handguns, but for fast access / fast grab, its better to keep to 2 in the hangers. at least one other can lay on bottom as well. Door is quiet but quick to open, good inside lighting. Can be bolted down after making holes through the bottom foam. Only slight knock is the sound for the buttons is kind of loud, and I would prefer a 4 digit code instead of 6. Overall awesome product for price, similar items well over twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a dream in my nightstand next to my bed. Plenty of room for both of my favorite 9MM handguns and spare magazines. Setting the code was easy and only takes seconds to extract either 9MM. With my dogs being my early warning system, your in a world of hurt if you break into my place while I am in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Pingree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 1911 full size gun with tactical light.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little safe for a guy who doesn't own many -- just one actually -- guns. I have a tactical 1911 so it has the flash light on it and the gun fits perfectly for me inside it. I saw another review where someone had to rig it, but mine just works. I have two kids so a safe is obviously required and this fits the bill nicely for me. I actually have been leaving my gun and one of my holsters in the safe with plenty of room as I only have one gun :).
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Mills

customer_reviews.title: It would have been better (and not much more work) to put a thin ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. As an FYI. The shelf is just metal. It would have been better (and not much more work) to put a thin layer of foam on top. The instruction manual is adequate but really lacking on installing a 9v battery (not included). You remove the cover and there is no wiring harness or "buckle" to remove (at least not apparent) and no indication of which terminal, + or -, goes up or down. Contacted the manufacturer and waiting for some help. Can't go any further w/o a battery installed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice safe especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice safe especially for the money. I like the dome light feature and the ease of access. What I don't like the is the audible alarm when the door opens. I would like it to be silent and not possibly tip off an intruder that I opened something electronic. The rails the guns hang on work well, but it would help if the light stayed on a few seconds longer to help when putting the gun on the rail. Overall an excellent value for the money with good functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Rokstaar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality safe
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily with my 9mm Glock. Can't wait to fill it up! The setup was easy, and the safe is very secure. I ended up flipping the rail upside down so my Glock with accessorie lights/laser can fit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kelley

customer_reviews.title: When reaching in you easily bang the gun around if you are in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. I expected to have a little more protection for the gun. Everything inside of the safe is metal. When reaching in you easily bang the gun around if you are in a rush (which you would be in an emergent situation). I would have like to see padding inside. For the cost it should have had such. With that being said, it is very sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Demar002

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe for Glocks!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is great. Perfect fit for my new Glock 19 Gen 5. The three hangers are great for 3 handguns. Enough room to leave a loaded mag on the floor of the safe below. The lighted buttons are good (although it might be a little better with the audible beeps). The cable that came with it was the perfect length to secure it properly. I'm glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: i agonized over this purchase for way too long. This one is simple (no finicky biometrics) . It's quiet, no beeping after you engage the SILENT mode. it's easy to use in the dark with only four keys. you still have plenty of combinations to chose from.
customer_reviews.author: P R Travis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safe for three guns
customer_reviews.text: great for quick access, sturdy, opens at the right speed (not too FAST). Large opening for screws, so excellent for larger screw/bolt heads to secure the safe. would like an option for 4 key presses. Hard to use the shelf for mix and match gun sizes , if you try to place small guns with larger ones. Perhaps they could be placed on the bottom of the safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is my favorite. The door opens softly so it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many gun safes. This one is my favorite. The door opens softly so it does not slam down on the surface. The rods hold guns securely allowing for fast withdrawal. You need to remove the interior shelf for smaller handguns, but that was not difficult. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Ninomiya

customer_reviews.title: Stealth Handgun Safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good case, however it would have been nice to have some rubber tips on the hangers. Oh by the when you put in your new combination make sure that you write it down, and put it some where you can get to it very fast!!! I love the Safe!
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Very functional and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and functionality. Exactly as description says. Fits 3 guns hanging and 2 on the bottom plus a couple mags. Shelf is great for passport /cash etc. Very happy with this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Purinton

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. I was being cheap and just as everyone said, it doesn’t work. For about a week it opened on the first try every time. Now I have to tap the top and hold the door in and hope on the 5th try it’ll open. Total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great safe! Needs some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. The digital code and door pops opens well. the door fits very tight preventing any prying open. A few things that could be worked on. The barrel rod should be adjustable to accommodate smaller more compact guns like the shield 9mm etc. It would be nice if the light remained on until the door closed and maybe a clear light instead of the red. The safe is made very well and I reccommend it to anyone. The "issues" above are more "nit picking". Bottom line is that i trust it around my kids and can have it open very quickly. The owner is a great guy looking for suggestions for future modifications.
customer_reviews.author: GolfEcho

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong, heavy, safe safe. I am very pleased with this safe and I believe it is much better than the previous "GunVault" safe I had. My only ask would be that the little red light inside stay on longer. It usually turns of in under 10 seconds and I would prefer that it stays on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Molitor

customer_reviews.title: Key not included
customer_reviews.text: Like other review, I also received safe with no key. Unable to open to install battery and set code. No response from customer service yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: Safe is very well made with heavier gauge steel than expected; it's heavy for its size. I mounted it on a closet shelf so it used the two slots in the back bottom and I drilled another hole in the back to bolt it to a wall stud. Electronic latch has just the slightest noticeable delay before opening, but nothing I couldn't get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Two month and very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very concerned with some of the reviews, but am so far very happy with this purchase. The first thing I did was try to jimmy the lock like I've seen in videos, but after half a hour with different tools, I had no luck. Is it going to stop someone with a crowbar? Probably not, but I feel very confident it will keep the kids out while providing quick access if needed. Also, no battery issues either after 2 months of weekly use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Byrne

product_meta.title: Stealth Handgun Safe Quick Access Pistol Security Box
feature_bullets: HIGH CAPACITY: Holds 3 Handguns at the Ready and 2 Handguns Flat - Max Capcity: 5
QUICK ACCESS: Spring Loaded Drop Down Door with Red Interior Light and Optional Silent Mode
SOLID STEEL CONSTRUCTION: 3/8" Solid Steel Door with Anti-Pry Tabs and High Strength Locking Latch - Straw and Pick proof with New Welded Lock Housing
High Strength Security Cable Included, High Density Foam Interior with Coated Scratch Resistant Rods
NEW POWER PORT: Keep it plugged in or use a 9V Battery External Dimensions: 9" H x 9" W x 12" D / Weighs: 20 lbs / CA DOJ APPROVED

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
